title: Block on a rough table

children.value:
A block is being pulled along a rough table at constant speed by a horizontal force 
$\vari{F}$
. It has mass 
$\valuedef{m}{2}{kg}$
 and the coefficient of friction between the block and the table 
$\valuedef{\mu }{0.5}{}$
. Use 
$\valuedef{g}{9.8}{m s\sup ^{-2}}$
. Find 
$\vari{F}$
.
